page.title: 16FAMILY LIFE (CONT'D)
page.content: Rachel goes off to Bradwell Junior School and Mark and I head for Hope Valley College. Stuart will have been slaving away as transport foreman at Laporte Industries (Eyam) for at least half an hour. At approximately 5pm we are together again as a family and we have our evening meal. This can be a lively affair with both children demanding "our time" together, and both of them insisting that they have done more work, had more laughs and moved more mountains than each other! After a hectic hour doing chores and three packed lunches for the next day, Rachel goes to her flute lesson and Mark and I return to Hope Valley College for a game of tennis. I return home to find Stuart mowing the lawn after a leisurely time with the newspaper!
